modName: Vampire No Sun Damage - Cloaks Helmets and Hoods
summary: This mod removes or reduces the sun damage effect (Health, Stamina, Magicka + Damage to Regeneration Rate) applied to all vampires when wearing any type of  head gear (Hoods, Helmets, Cloaks, ect).
descriptionHtml:
[line]
[size=3][b]Description[/b][/size]


This mod removes or reduces the sun damage effect ([color=RED]Health[/color], [color=GREEN]Stamina[/color], [color=BLUE]Magicka[/color] + [color=ORANGE]Damage to Regeneration Rate[/color]) applied to all vampires when wearing any type of head gear (Hoods, Helmets, Cloaks, ect).

[line]
[size=3][b]Details[/b][/size]

[list]
[*]Removes/Reduces Level 1-4 'Weakness to Sunlight' (Health, Stamina, and Magicka + Regen) damage from all vampires when your character or NPC is wearing any type of helmet, hood, cloak, ect..[/*]
[/list]

I have included several versions...

[color=ORANGE]VAMPIRE NO SUN DAMAGE:[/color] (Skyrim + Dawnguard)[color=RED] Removes all penalties to [/color][b]Health Magicka & Stamina[/b][color=RED] caused by the 'Weakness to Sunlight' effect[/color] (Damage to Regeneration Rate + Damage to Stats) [color=RED]while your hood/helmet is equipped.[/color]

[color=ORANGE]VAMPIRE NO SUN DAMAGE - REGEN:[/color] (Skyrim + Dawnguard)[color=RED] This version[/color] [u][color=ORANGE]permanently[/color][/u] [color=RED]removes the [/color][b]Health Magicka & Stamina[/b] [u][color=ORANGE]Regeneration Rate Damage[/color][/u] [color=RED]from the 'Weakness to Sunlight' effect, regardless if your hood/helmet is equipped or not.[/color] [color=ORANGE]Sun damage will only alter your stats.[/color]

[color=ORANGE]VAMPIRE NO SUN DAMAGE - REDUCED:[/color][color=RED] Reduces all penalties to [/color][b]Health Magicka & Stamina[/b][color=RED] caused by the 'Weakness to Sunlight' effect [/color](Damage to Regeneration Rate + Damage to Stats) by[color=orange][b] 50%[/b][/color][color=RED] while your hood/helmet is equipped.[/color]

* You only need to install 1 of the main files.

[line]
[size=3][b]Update[/b][/size]

[b]1.3[/b]
Added all Skyrim hooded robes.

[b]1.2[/b]
Released 'REDUCED' version which reduces damage by [b]50%[/b] when wearing hood,helmet, or cloak.

[b]1.1[/b]
I corrected the Dawnguard edit which changed the Level 3 'Weakness to Sunlight' regen rate damage incorrectly from 100% to 75%.

[b]1.0[/b]
Initial Release

[line]
[size=3][b]Compatibility[/b][/size]

[list]
[*]Compatible with all custom clothing/armor mods.[/*]
[*]Compatible with Better Vampires (Load .esp file after Better Vampires mod).[/*]
[*]Compatible with ARs Vampires Mod (Use Patch File).[/*]
[/list]
[list]
[*][color=RED]Not compatible with Vampiric Thirst mod.[/color][/*]
[*][color=RED]Not compatible with Belua Sanguinare Revisited mod.[/color][/*]
[/list]
*If you use any other vampire perk mods please let me know if this is compatible or not.

[line]
[size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size]

1. Use NMM installer.
2. Install manually by adding Vampire_NoSun&RegenDamage_Hoods&Helmets.esp to your Skyrim/Data folder.

* Use only Dawnguard or Skyrim file. Not both!

[line]
[size=3][b]Uninstall[/b][/size]

1. Deactivate with NMM.
2. Remove Vampire_NoSun&RegenDamage_Hoods&Helmets.esp from Skyrim/Data folder.

[line]
